Bing2YT Settings

Customise your YouTube search experience on Bing

Preferences

Choose how the YouTube search button appears on Bing search results. Button style is prominent, Icon style is subtle and compact.

⚠️ Changes require a page reload to take effect.

Redirect Settings

Choose how Bing results are redirected to YouTube. Banner displays a toast notification during the redirection to the video. Page opens a redirect page first, then automatically forwards you to the YouTube video.

Appearance

Developer

⚠️ Developer Mode is enabled. Console logging is active for debugging purposes.
